name: Paletta
storyline:
Broken into seven shards, the crown's pieces scattered across the kingdom. The magic that gave beauty to the lands withdrew into the shards, leaving the kingdom bleak and colorless.

Without the magic of the crown, the king was reverted to a mere mortal and slowly withered. After the king's death, the colors disappeared and the princess ran far, far away.

Without a ruler, the people were left to wonder: "Who will save these dying lands?"
summary: Atmospheric adventure game made with RPG Maker VX Ace. A princess must bring back color to her world.
